text: Welcome to AIM OS Setup
Before you begin, please read this agreement carefully.
AIM OS is a local simulation environment designed for creativity and exploration.
Your files, settings, and notes are stored locally in your browser's storage.
No data is sent to external servers. Everything stays on your device.
Apps included in AIM OS:
• Explorer: Browse your virtual filesystem and manage files.
• Notepad: Edit text files quickly and easily.
• Browser: View HTML, images, and even offline relics.
• Paint: Draw, sketch, and open images on a canvas.
• Media Player: Play audio, video, and view images.
• Host.exe: Run simulated .exe payloads decoded into HTML.
• Notes: Keep quick thoughts and ideas in a dedicated space.
• Settings & Regedit: Customize themes and file associations.
Your username will personalize your experience across all apps.
Important: Changing your username updates the local user profile.
Widgets can be added to your desktop for quick access to features.
All changes are reversible by clearing localStorage.
By continuing, you agree to:
• Use AIM OS for creative and educational purposes.
• Understand that this is a local simulation, not a real OS.
• Accept that clearing browser data will remove your files and settings.
Ready to begin your journey? Click Next to proceed.
